org.janusgraph.core

Interface JanusGraphEdge

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.structure.Edge, org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.structure.Element, Idfiable, JanusGraphElement, JanusGraphRelation, Removable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEdge, CacheEdge, StandardEdge

    public interface JanusGraphEdge
extends JanusGraphRelation, org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.structure.Edge
    A JanusGraphEdge connects two JanusGraphVertex. It extends the functionality provided by Blueprint's Edge and is a special case of a JanusGraphRelation.
    Author:
    Matthias Bröcheler (http://www.matthiasb.com)
    See Also:
    Edge, JanusGraphRelation, EdgeLabel

        Returns the vertex at the opposite end of the edge.
        Parameters:
        vertex - vertex on which this edge is incident
        Returns:
        The vertex at the opposite end of the edge.
        Throws:
        InvalidElementException - if the edge is not incident on the specified vertex
